LINE: 夫 + 人君 + 無 + 諫 + 臣 + 則 + 失 + 政
ALIGNMENT: 夫 + 人君 + 無 + 諫 + 臣 + 則 + 失 + t e ŋ h/²
TRANSLATION: If a lord has no ministers to admonish him, then he will go astray in governing.

LINE: 士 + 無 + 教 + 交 + 則 + 失 + 德
ALIGNMENT: 士 + 無 + 教 + 交 + 則 + 失 + lh ê ŋ h/²
TRANSLATION: If a gentleman has no friends to instruct him, then he will go astray when listening to others.

LINE: 狂 + 馬 + 不 + 釋 + 其 + 策
ALIGNMENT: 狂 + 馬 + 不 + 釋 + 其 + tsh r ê k
TRANSLATION: On an unbroken horse, you don’t let go of the switch;

LINE: 操 + 弓 + 不 + 返 + 於 + 檠
ALIGNMENT: 操 + 弓 + 不 + 返 + 於 + ɡ r e ŋ
TRANSLATION: when handling a bow, you don’t return it to its box.

LINE: 木 + 受 + 繩 + 則 + 直
ALIGNMENT: 木 + 受 + 繩 + 則 + d r ǝ k
TRANSLATION: Wood is straightened when it has the plumb-line applied to it;

LINE: 人 + 受 + 諫 + 則 + 聖
ALIGNMENT: 人 + 受 + 諫 + 則 + lh e ŋ h/²
TRANSLATION: Men become sages when they receive admonitions.

LINE: 受 + 學 + 重 + 問
ALIGNMENT: 受 + 學 + 重 + 問
TRANSLATION: Who, of those that received teachings and enquired repeatedly,

LINE: 孰 + 不 + 順 + 成
ALIGNMENT: 孰 + 不 + 順 + d e ŋ
TRANSLATION: did not arrive at perfection smoothly?

LINE: 毀 + 仁 + 惡 + 士
ALIGNMENT: 毀 + 仁 + 惡 + 士
TRANSLATION: He who denigrates others and slanders gentlemen

LINE: 且 + 近 + 於 + 刑
ALIGNMENT: 且 + 近 + 於 + ɡ ê ŋ
TRANSLATION: will be a step away from punishment.

LINE: 君子 + 不 + 可以 + 不 + 學
ALIGNMENT: 君子 + 不 + 可以 + 不 + 學
TRANSLATION: The noble man has to study.
